site: /
version: 1
name: NDC2021A Batch Directory
description: Directory of Notre Dame College Batch 2021 Group A — public student profiles (ID, name, optional contact and social links submitted via form).

schema: JSON-LD

# If you plan to reuse data at scale, please respect the repository license
